bio:
Soulcial is an AI-driven DeSocial protocol. 
Beyond SocialFi: Your Web3 Soul is your Capital, no need to create content.
contributionDescription:
Our protocol aims at web3 massive adoption, and based on the existing Ethereum ecosystem and AI open-source models, we have already implemented the following product features:
- A user-friendly login experience based on the Particle protocol to reduce users entry barriers.
- An open-source image generation model trained based on Stable Diffusion, reducing the barriers to creating user-generated social assets and enriching the on-chain assets and content ecosystem.
- We also plan to integrate ERC-6551 and abstract accounts to expand the utilization of NFTs, thus building a personalized social metaverse for a wider users.
impactDescription:
We aim to attract over 50,000 users to use our dapp within 3 months, and 500,000 in a year. Every user can generate their exclusive social assets and connect to more soulmates in our project.

- Lowered the barrier to entry for creating social assets through the integration of visual social score and AIGC, enriching the op ecosystem.
- Innovative transaction and incentive mechanisms providing creators in op ecosystem with diverse monetization tools.
- Combined with the ERC-6551 and Abstract Accounts, the composable social metaverse has expanded the use cases for NFTs in op ecosystem.
pwCategorySuggestions: Decentralized Social Media, NFT Integration, AI-driven Protocols
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged because it is making promises of future impact in violation of rule 1. They claim to anticipate the attraction of over 50,000 users within 3 months and 500,000 within a year.
